highlights: ▲ Revenue/Load improved significantly; LOH up sharply; Variable/Load also increased.
Core OR improved by approximately 6.5 pts; overall loads decreased compared to the prior 4-week average.

stories_top10.name: MN-DUL → WI-MAD
stories_top10.line: ▼ Core OR worsened as loads fell significantly; operational challenges noted.
stories_top10.detail: Driver: Lane MN-DUL → WI-MAD had the largest impact.

stories_top10.name: MN-DUL → MN-DUL
stories_top10.line: ▼ Core OR worsened alongside a sharp drop in loads.
stories_top10.detail: Driver: Lane MN-DUL → MN-DUL affected overall performance.

stories_top10.line: → Core OR held steady, though loads were lower.
stories_top10.detail: Driver: Lane MN-DUL → NY-ROC contributed modestly.

stories_top10.name: MN-DUL → NC-CHA
stories_top10.line: → Core OR managed to remain stable; consistent loads observed.
stories_top10.detail: Driver: Lane MN-DUL → NC-CHA played a steady role.

stories_top10.name: WI-MAR → WI-MAR
stories_top10.line: ▼ Core OR worsened significantly; operational gaps noted.
stories_top10.detail: Driver: Lane WI-MAR → WI-MAR showed notable variance.

stories_top10.name: MN-DUL → WI-MAR
stories_top10.line: ▼ Core OR declined despite slight increases in loads.
stories_top10.detail: Driver: Lane MN-DUL → WI-MAR was underperforming.

stories_top10.line: → Core OR held steady with limited fluctuations in loads.
stories_top10.detail: Driver: Lane MN-DUL → ME-BAN remained consistent.

stories_top10.name: TX-DAL → IN-IND
stories_top10.line: → Core OR stable; fewer loads impacted performance.
stories_top10.detail: Driver: Lane TX-DAL → IN-IND has stabilized.

stories_top10.name: MN-DUL → MN-MIN
stories_top10.line: → Core OR held comparatively steady, minor shifts observed.
stories_top10.detail: Driver: Lane MN-DUL → MN-MIN maintained equilibrium.

stories_top10.name: WI-MAR → WI-WAU
stories_top10.line: → Core OR improved slightly as volumes adjusted.
stories_top10.detail: Driver: Lane WI-MAR → WI-WAU showed resilience.

final_overview: Profitability improved from 08/23/25 (4wk) to 08/30/25 (1wk), driven by an uplift in Core OR and increased revenues. The significant improvements in LOH and Variable/Load were key contributors to the positive shift.
style_key: Say “Core OR improved” when OR% decreased; “worsened” when OR% increased; “held” when flat.
Mention “compared against network Core OR” only when asterisks indicate a substituted value.
